title: Blouse (mola)
medium:
Medium: cotton, rayon
Technique: reverse applique with embroidery
description: Cut-out cottons in many colors, with red predominating, stitched in reverse-applique technique to make exotic bright design of long-beaked birds within a labyrinth of abstract shapes.  This forms body of blouse, with slightly different patterns front and back, and is sewn into yoke of patterned yellow rayon to make a short-sleeved blouse with a gathered neckline.
name: Blouse (mola)
